titles.title: The Lord, My God, My Sun And Shield

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord, my God, my sun and shield,
He gives grace and glory.
No good thing will He withhold
From them that walk uprightly.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh, Lord, my God
Blessed is the man
That trusts in Thee,
That trusts in Thee.
